AngularJS What-If Component & Service

The What-If Anaylsis table utilizes a custom AngularJS service to save not only the center square of data but any square that the user selects. The What-If component also highlights the data in the table that has been saved.

What-if Table Layout

The What-If Analysis table has been converted into a reusable AngularJS component. It has been placed into a horizontally scrollable container to allow the entire table to be viewed on devices with small screens. An example of it within a layout can be seen in the Graceful Degredation Assignment
